title: Education Program Type Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for types of education programs and offerings.

terms.label: Degree Program
terms.definition: A program leading to a formally awarded academic degree, such as a bachelor's or master's degree.

terms.label: Certificate Program
terms.definition: A program leading to a formal certificate or diploma but not a degree, often focused on applied or technical skills.

terms.label: Non-credit Course or Program
terms.definition: An educational offering that does not confer academic credit but may support professional or personal development.

terms.label: Apprenticeship Program
terms.definition: A structured work-based learning program that combines on-the-job training with related instruction.

terms.label: Short Course or Bootcamp
terms.definition: An intensive, time-limited educational offering focused on a specific set of skills or topics.

terms.label: Continuing Education Program
terms.definition: A program intended for ongoing professional education, often for licensed or certified professionals.

terms.label: Other Program Type
terms.definition: An education program type that does not fit another, more specific category in this vocabulary.
